verses.esv:
22:1   A good name is to be chosen rather than great riches,
    and favor is better than silver or gold.
2   The rich and the poor meet together;
    the LORD is the Maker of them all.
verses.kjv: 1 A good name is rather to be chosen than great riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold. 2 The rich and poor meet together: the LORD is the maker of them all.
verses.niv: 1 A good name is more desirable than great riches; to be esteemed is better than silver or gold. 2 Rich and poor have this in common: The LORD is the Maker of them all.

verses.esv:
7:1   A good name is better than precious ointment,
    and the day of death than the day of birth.
verses.kjv: 1 A good name is better than precious ointment; and the day of death than the day of one’s birth.
verses.niv: 1 A good name is better than fine perfume, and the day of death better than the day of birth.

verses.esv:
7   The memory of the righteous is a blessing,
    but the name of the wicked will rot.
verses.kjv: 7 The memory of the just is blessed: but the name of the wicked shall rot.
verses.niv: 7 The memory of the righteous will be a blessing, but the name of the wicked will rot.

verses.esv:
22:1   A good name is to be chosen rather than great riches,
    and favor is better than silver or gold.
verses.kjv: 1 A good name is rather to be chosen than great riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold.
verses.niv: 1 A good name is more desirable than great riches; to be esteemed is better than silver or gold.

verses.esv: 8 See to it that no one takes you captive by philosophy and empty deceit, according to human tradition, according to the elemental spirits of the world, and not according to Christ.
verses.kjv: 8 Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.
verses.niv: 8 See to it that no one takes you captive through hollow and deceptive philosophy, which depends on human tradition and the basic principles of this world rather than on Christ.

verses.esv: 22 But you know Timothy’s proven worth, how as a son with a father he has served with me in the gospel.
verses.kjv: 22 But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.
verses.niv: 22 But you know that Timothy has proved himself, because as a son with his father he has served with me in the work of the gospel.

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

verses.esv: 2 For by it the people of old received their commendation.
verses.kjv: 2 For by it the elders obtained a good report.
verses.niv: 2 This is what the ancients were commended for.

verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

verses.esv: 37 For nothing will be impossible with God.”
verses.kjv: 37 For with God nothing shall be impossible.
verses.niv: 37 For nothing is impossible with God."

verses.esv: 13 No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to man. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tempted beyond your ability, but with the temptation he will also provide the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.
verses.kjv: 13 There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
verses.niv: 13 No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can stand up under it.

verses.esv: 19 Therefore whoever relaxes one of the least of these commandments and teaches others to do the same will be called least in the kingdom of heaven, but whoever does them and teaches them will be called great in the kingdom of heaven.
verses.kjv: 19 Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments, and shall teach men so, he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven: but whosoever shall do and teach them, the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven.
verses.niv: 19 Anyone who breaks one of the least of these commandments and teaches others to do the same will be called least in the kingdom of heaven, but whoever practices and teaches these commands will be called great in the kingdom of heaven.

verses.esv:
31   but they who wait for the LORD shall renew their strength;
    they shall mount up with wings like eagles;
  they shall run and not be weary;
    they shall walk and not faint.
verses.kjv: 31 But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
verses.niv: 31 but those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

verses.esv: 6 And I am sure of this, that he who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.
verses.kjv: 6 Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:
verses.niv: 6 being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 38 And Peter said to them, “Repent and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
verses.kjv: 38 Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
verses.niv: 38 Peter replied, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv:
4   Delight yourself in the LORD,
    and he will give you the desires of your heart.
verses.kjv: 4 Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.niv: 4 Delight yourself in the LORD and he will give you the desires of your heart.

verses.esv:
A Psalm of David.

23:1   The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
2     He makes me lie down in green pastures.
  He leads me beside still waters.
3     He restores my soul.
  He leads me in paths of righteousness
    for his name’s sake.
4   Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
    I will fear no evil,
  for you are with me;
    your rod and your staff,
    they comfort me.
5   You prepare a table before me
    in the presence of my enemies;
  you anoint my head with oil;
    my cup overflows.
6   Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
    all the days of my life,
  and I shall dwell in the house of the LORD
    forever.
verses.kjv: 1 The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want. 2 He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters. 3 He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake. 4 Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me. 5 Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over. 6 Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
verses.niv: 1 The LORD is my shepherd, I shall not be in want. 2 He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, 3 he restores my soul. He guides me in paths of righteousness for his name's sake. 4 Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me. 5 You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows. 6 Surely goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the LORD forever.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness,

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv: 17 So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
verses.kjv: 17 So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
verses.niv: 17 Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word of Christ.

verses.esv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, 23 gentleness, self-control; against such things there is no law.
verses.kjv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, 23 Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
verses.niv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, 23 gentleness and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv: 33 I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.”
verses.kjv: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
verses.niv: 33 "I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."
